page.title: 12THE RUGBY CLUB DISCO
page.content: On Saturday I went to Laura's because that night there was a disco and Laura and I were going together.First we got dressed and then we got all dolled up. When we came back downstairs Laura's mum said Laura looked dishy! Then we went to the disco. We went in and danced for a bit.Donna, Lyndsey,Dawn,Helen and Laura were trying to make me kiss Scott so I tried to get some one to go with Laura but I had no luck so I chased Scott and Nigel round the tent. When I got back I had a packet of crisps and sat down.Then we had the Pink Panther song and you had to have a partner,so I had Laura.Helen and I shared a bitter and then it was time to go home.
